mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.code AS "code", a.arrival_code AS "arrivalcode", a.arrival_date AS "arrivaldate", a.ck AS "ck.id", a.hw AS "hw.id", a.u8code AS "u8code", ck.name AS "ck.name", hw.name AS "hw.name"
LEFT JOIN base_cangku ck ON ck.id = a.ck LEFT JOIN base_huowei hw ON hw.id = a.hw
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_ruku_caigou( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, code, arrival_code, arrival_date, ck, hw, u8code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{arrivalcode}, #{arrivaldate}, #{ck.id}, #{hw.id}, #{u8code} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_ruku_caigou SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, code = #{code}, arrival_code = #{arrivalcode}, arrival_date = #{arrivaldate}, ck = #{ck.id}, hw = #{hw.id}, u8code = #{u8code} WHERE id = #{id}
